channel.title: Hzm is here
channel.description: Recent content on Hzm is here

item.title: Test
item.description: rsync rsync -avzP /data/web2 root@39.105.115.132:/data/ 生产solr cp ttj-ik-analyzer-6.0.jar /usr/local/solr-6.4.2/server/solr-webapp/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/ scp ttj-ik-analyzer-6.0.jar root@solr_2:/usr/local/solr-6.4.2/server/solr-webapp/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/ scp ttj-ik-analyzer-6.0.jar root@solr_3:/usr/local/solr-6.4.2/server/solr-webapp/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/ #开启服务 /usr/local/solr-6.4.2/bin/solr stop /usr/local/solr-6.4.2/bin/solr start -cloud -s /data/solr_cloud/node1/solr -h 39.105.143.74 -p 8983 -z solr_1:2181,solr_2:2181,solr_3:2181 -force /usr/local/solr-6.4.2/bin/solr start -cloud -s /data/solr_cloud/node1/solr -h 39.105.144.131 -p 8983 -z solr_1:2181,solr_2:2181,solr_3:2181 -force /usr/local/solr-6.4.2/bin/solr start -cloud -s /data/solr_cloud/node1/solr -h 39.106.161.172 -p 8983 -z solr_1:2181,solr_2:2181,solr_3:2181 -force 安全启动数据库: mysqld_safe –defaults-file=/home/mysql/data/slave-my.cnf –user=mysql –basedir=/usr/local/mysql –datadir=/home/mysql/data & nginx升级插件upstream_check patch -p1 < /root/nginx_upstream_check_module-master/check_1.12.1+.patch ./configure –prefix=/usr/local/nginx –sbin-path=/usr/sbin/nginx –conf-path=/etc/nginx/nginx.
